param.name: coreapp
param.label: Core Application
param.description: Causes this application to not appearin the users applications list but it will allow this application to appear in the user profile automatically if selected.

param.name: fabrik_view_id
param.label: View ID
param.description: Numeric Fabrik table, form or visualization ID

param.name: fabrik_row_id
param.label: Row ID
param.description: Numeric Fabrik rowid, if using Form or Details view. Set to -1 for logged on userid, or -2 for userid of profile being viewed

param.name: fabrik_usekey
param.label: Usekey
param.description: Fabrik element name containing userid to use as search key if using rowid -1 or -2

param.name: fabrik_element
param.label: Element
param.description: If using Element view, full element name to show.

param.name: fabrik_additional
param.label: Additional
param.description: Additional plugin parameters, such as element filters like table___element=foo, in a space separated list
